challengeFiles.name: styles

tests.text: Your .large selector should have a height property set to 10px.
Your .large, .medium selector should have a background-color property set to black.

description: Create a new .large selector and give it a height property set to 10px. Also create an .large, .medium selector and set the background-color property to black.
